bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, tapered/shaped HT, compact race design, 1-3/8" lower bearing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8 upper and 1-3/8" lower stainless steel cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 8mm cone spacer with 20mm of spacers
Specialized Comp-Set 6061 alloy, cone head bolt, 12-degree, 4-degree shim, 31.8mm
Shimano Ultegra STI, Flight Deck compatible
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Turbo Elite, BlackBelt, 100TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
